original_title: Babes Illustrated: Lesbian Office Affairs Vol. 2
overview: Jessa & Dana - Jessa spends her workday sneaking sexy selfies to all the boys but is finally busted by her sexy boss Dana. After she gets chewed out she gets chewed ON!!!  Brett & Violet - Eager employee Violet is looking for a leg up in climbing the corporate ladder but her blonde bombshell boss Brett needs to teach her a thing or 2 about "Customer Service"!!!  Holly & Alana - Tiny young slacker Holly doesn't care about her job since daddy owns the company but her boss just happens to be her stepmom and she not only lays down the law but lays Holly all over the warehouse!!!  Aaliyah & Bailey - Young Bailey is working overtime on the inventory when her boss Aaliyah comes by to double check her work and give her an "extended" break to show how much she is appreciated!!!
title: Babes Illustrated: Lesbian Office Affairs Vol. 2
